original_text: However, he did not buy the land of the priests, because they received a regular allotment from Pharaoh and had food enough from the allotment Pharaoh gave them. That is why they did not sell their land.
korean_text: 제사장들의 토지는 사지 아니하였으니 제사장들은 바로에게서 녹을 받음이라 바로가 주는 녹을 먹으므로 그들이 토지를 팔지 않음이었더라

sentences.original_text: However, he did not buy the land of the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 제사장들의 땅을 사지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: because they received a regular allotment from Pharaoh
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 바로에게서 정기적인 분배물을 받았기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and had food enough from the allotment Pharaoh gave them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바로가 그들에게 준 분배물로부터 충분한 음식을 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: That is why they did not sell their land
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그들이 자신들의 땅을 팔지 않았던 이유입니다
